scripts.prebuild-ol: rm -rf node_modules/ol/build && mkdir -p node_modules/ol/build && cp -rf node_modules/ol/src/ol node_modules/ol/build && node node_modules/ol/tasks/serialize-workers.cjs
scripts.prebuild-ol-mapbox-style: rm -rf node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/build && mkdir -p node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/build && cp -rf node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/dist/*.js node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/build && sed -i "s#from 'ol#from 'ol/build/ol#g" node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/build/*.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run prebuild-ol && npm run prebuild-ol-mapbox-style && npm run prebuild-ol-maplibre-layer
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && parcel build src/index.html --public-url=./ --no-scope-hoist --no-optimize
